checkInvalidOperations(String) - Method in class com.fdmgroup.tdd.Calculator.Calculator
Checks for any invalid operations within the expression such as: "+*", "-*", "**", "/*", "+/", "-/", "//"..
cleanExpression(String) - Method in class com.fdmgroup.tdd.Calculator.Calculator
Cleans the expression by removing any leading '+' or '-' signs to make it readable by the code.
